migrations.title: Update zod imports
migrations.description: Replace `import { z } from 'zod'` with `import { z } from 'astro/zod'` in all files

migrations.title: Update Zod 4 API calls
migrations.description: Replace `z.string().email()` with `z.email()` and `.errors` with `.issues` on ZodError

migrations.title: Remove experimental.contentIntellisense
migrations.description: Delete the `experimental: { contentIntellisense: true }` block from astro.config.mjs

migrations.title: Configure astro:env
migrations.description: Add env schema to astro.config.mjs and update import.meta.env references. See: https://docs.deployvelocity.com/upgrade-guides/beta-1-to-beta-2/

migrations.title: Enable CSP
migrations.description: Add `security: { csp: true }` to astro.config.mjs with external resource allowlists

migrations.title: Remove colorScheme prop from Button
migrations.description: The `colorScheme` prop has been removed from Button. To achieve the invert effect, wrap the Button in a `<div class="invert-section">` instead.

migrations.title: Remove variant="invert" from Input
migrations.description: The `variant="invert"` prop has been removed from Input. To achieve the invert effect, wrap the Input in a `<div class="invert-section">` instead.

migrations.title: Rename selectSize to size on Select
migrations.description: The `selectSize` prop on Select has been renamed to `size`. Update all usages: `selectSize="sm"` → `size="sm"`.

migrations.title: Rename textareaSize to size on Textarea
migrations.description: The `textareaSize` prop on Textarea has been renamed to `size`. Update all usages: `textareaSize="sm"` → `size="sm"`.
